title: John Hay
deleted: On film and television John Hay has been portrayed by
*[[John Harron]] in ''[[Lincoln in the White House]]'' (1939)
*Eric Sinclair in ''[[Alcoa Presents: One Step Beyond|One Step Beyond]]'' (1960)
*[[John Huston]] in ''[[The Wind and the Lion]]'' (1975)
*Doug Kaye in ''[[The Lincoln Conspiracy (film)|The Lincoln Conspiracy]]'' (1977)
